Package datas

Class Duree

java.lang.Object
datas.Duree
public class Duree extends Object
This class defines a temporal duration. It allows the manipulation of time intervals. * A duration is expressed in milliseconds.
Author:
Aurelia Segarra

  • Method Details

    • getLeTemps

      public long getLeTemps()
      GETTER
      Returns:
      the value of the duration in milliseconds

    • ajoute

      public void ajoute(Duree autreDuree)
      Modifier that adds a duration to the current duration
      Parameters:
      autreDuree - Duration to add

    • compareA

      public int compareA(Duree autreDuree)
      Method that compares the current duration and another duration
      Parameters:
      autreDuree - Duration to compare to the current duration
      Returns:
      an integer that takes the following values :
      • -1 : if current duration inf autreDuree
      • 0 : if current duration equals to autreDuree
      • 1 : if current duration sup autreDuree

    • enJHMS

      private int[] enJHMS()
      Private method that divides the time into intervals (days, hours, minutes, seconds, milliseconds)
      Returns:
      an array of integers

    • enTexte

      public String enTexte(char mode)
      Method that returns the current duration as a string
      Parameters:
      mode - -The string format depends on the selected "mode" (given in parameter)
      • if mode == 'J' => "JJJ jours HH h"
      • if mode == 'H' => "HHH:MM:SS"
      • if mode == 'S' => "SSS.MMM sec"
      • if mode == 'M' => "MMMMMM millisec"
      Returns:
      the duration as a string
